New Records: David Miller scored 56 runs for South Africa, Aiden Markram scored 52 runs, Tristan Stubbs and Quinton de Kock scored their first century openings for South Africa
Key Match Events: David Miller hit two sixes in a row to turn the game around, Ashwin took crucial wickets including de Kock and Markram, the match was decided in the 19th over with South Africa reaching the target
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli praised the team's effort, the match had significant implications for both teams' World Cup campaigns
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was broadcasted on Star Sports and Disney+ Hotstar, it was the 18th match in the tournament
